attributes.action: Drop the price of fuel to let us compete
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned would like the government of our country to reduce fuel duty to allow us the individuals and British business to thrive. We want to no longer see European hauliers coming in to the UK and doing work which should be going to our hauliers because of their cheap fuel. We think you owe it to the UK economy to give it a big shot in the arm and reduce the prices to let us compete.
